mapper.sql: select suec.id, suec.coupon_id, suec.user_id, suec.coupon_name, suec.coupon_type, suec.coupon_price, suec.coupon_no, suec.coupon_limit, suec.coupon_rules, suec.valid_from, suec.valid_end, suec.quantity, suec.status, suec.source_from, suec.purpose, suec.purpose_merchant_user_id, suec.create_by_user_id, suec.create_by_name, suec.create_time, su.legal_name, GROUP_CONCAT(uem.merchant_name) as purpose_merchant_name from sys_user_ex_coupon suec left join sys_user su on su.user_id = suec.user_id left join user_ex_merchant uem on FIND_IN_SET(uem.user_id, suec.purpose_merchant_user_id) > 0
